resources.string: Incompatible with this device for receiving. While you can use it for sending messages.
Not yet implemented, please stay tuned.
Install LIGHT MESSAGE on two Android smartphones and execute the application. One as sender and another as receiver.

On sender, type the messages you want to send, and click SEND button. Then cover the receiver\'s light sensor by the sender\'s screen rapidly(or keep a distance within 10 cm, if you use LED to send, you can try it with larger distance).
On receiver, click RECEIVE button, and just wait for the result. Hope you enjoy it!

The light sensor is on the top of front face, above the screen.

Step two and step three must be done in 5 seconds.

Attention! This application may not works for some smartphones caused by the variance of the light sensors. But i will continue to improve it. Please looking forward.
